price: Ati tukisha kufa tukawa udongo na mafupa, ndio tutalipwa na kuhisabiwa?
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
footnotes: Ati baada ya kwisha teketea, tukawa udongo na mafupa, tutakuja kuwa hai mara nyengine, tuhisabiwe na tulipwe kwa vitendo tulivyo kwisha vitenda?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamadīnūna
